title: Ticks History Response
description: Response for ticks_history request, containing historic tick data

history.description: Historic tick data for a given symbol. Note: this will always return the latest possible set of ticks with accordance to the parameters specified.

prices.description: An array containing list of tick values for the corresponding epoch values in `times` array.

times.description: An array containing list of epoch values for the corresponding tick values in `prices` array.

candles.description: Array of OHLC (open/high/low/close) price values for the given time (only for style=`candles`)

close.description: It is the close price value for the given time

high.description: It is the high price value for the given time

low.description: It is the low price value for the given time

open.description: It is the open price value for the given time

pip_size.description: Indicates the number of decimal points that the returned amounts must be displayed with

msg_type.description: Type of the response according to the `style` sent in request. Would be `history` or `candles` for the first response, and `tick` or `ohlc` for the rest when subscribed.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.

id.description: A per-connection unique identifier. Can be passed to the `forget` API call to unsubscribe.
